location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, to the Secretary, Bank of Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: The letter book has been turned upside down and the correspondence relating to banking and financial matters has been entered from back to front, therefore the correspondence itself is upside down in relation to the folio numbers.

mods.abstract: Note requesting that 114 rupees be debited from his account and given to Messrs Remington in order to pay Michael John Maxwell Shaw-Stewart.
